donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The project implemented as part of the EU Pilot Roma Projects aims at supporting the process of implementation of the other two strands of the EU Pilot Roma Projects on early childhood education and care and microfinance, and at formulating replicable lessons learnt that could be applied in similar programs targeting vulnerable populations in these and in other EU countries. This will be achieved through close work with the EU Pilot projects implementing organizations on M&E and respective data collection, through systemic beneficiaries' feedback analysis as well as through administering regional survey on socio-economic status of marginalized Roma in Central and South-Eastern Europe.

project_descr: Roma Pilot project - Tools and methods for evaluation and data collection
project_title: Tools, methods for evaluation and data collection ROMA
